EmailTemplate.name: CwK.Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Don't Miss This - REGISTER NOW FOR COFFEE WITH KELLY - BILLING!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAY CONNECTED <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> <http://twitter.com/tritechsoftware> <http://www.linkedin.com/companies/tritech-software-systems> <http://www.youtube.com/user/TriTechSoftware> Monthly Customer Service Webinar Series Coffee with Kelly - Billing Every Second Tuesday of the Month
{{lead.First Name:default=EMS Billing Customer}} -
Register now for complimentary, monthly training on your Respond Billing or TriTech.com Billing (formerly Sweet-Billing) software. By registering now, you'll automatically receive invites to the live monthly trainings, as well as links to the recordings if you miss the live event. These half-hour tips and sips will help you keep your software skills and industry knowledge fresh!
Don’t miss the next session – register now to make sure you’re signed up for the live monthly sessions where you can ask questions and get your specific questions answered.
November 13: Batch Credits December 11: Contract Write-off poster January 8: Customer Portal Knowledge Base
<http://offers.tritech.com/CwK-Billing_Registration.html>
If you cannot view the button above, please copy and paste this link into a browser window: http://offers.tritech.com/CwK-Billing_Registration.html
For information about TriTech's EMS Billing or ePCR cloud-based software - or other integrated EMS applications - please contact us at sales@tritech.com <mailto:sales@tritech.com> or 800-537-3927. Training Information: Complimentary Monthly Customer Service Webinar Series Every Second Tuesday of the Month 11:30 AM Eastern | 10:30 AM Central | 9:30 AM Mountain | 8:30 AM Pacific
All you need is an internet connection to join. Listen through your computer speakers, or dial in through a telephone. Every live session includes a question-answer session where you get your specific questions answered.
